Name: Bowling Hills
About the game: Bowling Hills is an exciting golf/bowling mashup! Each lane offers a new set of hills and hazards that requires you to change your approach. Master the lanes alone, or invite your friends over to play some local multiplayer. There's a surprising amount of strategy and skill in this unique bowling experience! Ever-Changing Lanes Tired of making the same old shot on the same old bowling lane over and over again? Then the lanes of Bowling Hills should be right up your alley! Every frame, the hills and hazards of the lane are replaced, forcing you to change your strategy for every roll. Immersive Controls Control every aspect of your roll! Your roll strength, spin, and release angle are all controlled by your mouse and its movement. If motion controls are more your speed, grab your Nintendo Switch Joy-Con and get bowling! Customization Bowl in style by selecting the character and ball of your choice!
